page.title: 03Education in Holbeach Bank
page.content: There were schools in Moulton Seas End and Saracen's Head but they have been closed down. Holbeach Bank school is the only one that exists in our block although there are play schools in the other villages. In Holbeach Bank School there are 72 children and 3 teachers. Mrs Norris is the secretary and she comes for 1 and a half days a week.Miss Jefferson is the headteacher and also she teaches the children beetween 9 and 11 years old. Mrs Christensen is the teacher of the 6 to 9 year olds.Mrs Currington is the infants teacher.There have been extensions built on the school since it was built.The infants' classroom was built later and so were the hall and toilets.Some of the children come on the bus,some come on the taxi,some walk or come on bicycles or in cars.
